messages: cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:35): yo im using xmlhttprequest and FileReader() and im in the onloadend callback .. lookking for my response from the server .. any1 know where that is?
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (23:38): paul_irish: are there any updates to our hosting issue?
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:38): cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7: that was the best answer for the question which was little hard to understand
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:38): runs when the file upload is complete
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:38): and MDN has dociumentation regarding it
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:38): i assume in that callback i can access the response from the server
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:39): hmm looking through this i see 'response'
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:40): you can probably 1) use closure and access xhr object through it and get its data 2) save data in some other callback before onloadend
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:40): 3) onloadend has the data but hidden
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:40): for 3) I suggest you put in debugger; breakpoint in firebug and inspect around in javascript debugger
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:41): this is the return data
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:41): this doesnt appear until its done
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:41): yea ive done all that before i came in here
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:41): i went through the entire xhr obj and the returned onloadend obj
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:41): its ok if you dont know we're in the same spot.. just wonderin if someone knew off the top of their head
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:42): let me see what I am doing in my code
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:42): this takes few minutes to boot up...
43de7aeac5008db44d4b80933467a8d2 (23:45): what's the point of making images in html5 rather than photoshop?
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:53): im getting that 200 1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 .. just responseText is an empty string
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:53): when in the php file im clearly passing text
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:57): cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7: inspect the response in Firebug Network tab
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:57): I assume your HTTP response is corrupted
1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148 (23:57): but it should give error code 0
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:59): i think my answer is in xhr.upload()
cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (00:04): 1bd0a14e07fd930aee8256e5bc2eb148: xhr.onreadystatechange = function() { console.log(xhr.responseText); }; was my answer
